metadata.title: CVE-2021-22234 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 13.11 before 13.11.7, all versions starting from 13.12 before13.12.8, and all versions starting from 14.0 before 14.0.4. A speciallycrafted design image allowed attackers to read arbitrary files on theserver.

criterions.comment: gitlab-agent package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
